info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:47AM EST until January 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Southern Herkimer, Southern Fulton, Montgomery and Northern Fulton Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A light wintry mix will develop in the afternoon hours today and continue overnight before tapering off to scattered rain and snow showers shortly before or just after midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
